Importing DuckDb libraries
```{r}
library(DBI)
library(duckdb)

```

```{r}
# Connect to DuckDB and read first 10 rows
con = dbConnect(duckdb(), dbdir = "duckdb_r_db")
with(dbConnect(duckdb(), dbdir = "duckdb_r_db"), {
  # Create table and read data
  dbExecute (con,"
    CREATE TABLE charts AS 
    SELECT * FROM read_csv_auto('GHED_Burkina_Pakistan.csv');
    ")
  dbGetQuery(con, "select * charts limit 10")
})
```
